src:
Olahan Bebek Maknyus
Mantul! Legit Bebek Bakar Sambel Cobek Khas Soreang Dicocol Sambal Segar
04 Nov 2019, 05:30 by Wisma Putra - detikFood


Foto: Wisma Putra

FOKUS BERITA Olahan Bebek MaknyusBandung - Pulang liburan di Kawasan Wisata Ciwidey? Bingung cari tempat makan yang nyaman dan enak makanannya? Bebek Bakar Sambel Cobek bisa menjadi pilihan.Buat penggemar bebek, wajib mampir ke RM Saung Cobek Soreang. Bebek Bakar Sambel Cobeknya jadi salah satu menu favorit dan terlaris di Rumah Makan Saung Cobek Soreang, Kabupaten Bandung, Jawa Barat.Tak mau ketinggalan detikcom juga menyempatkan diri mencicipi, kuliner satu ini. Satu porsi Bebek Bakar Sambal Cobek terdiri dari satu potong bebek bakar, nasi putih, satu tahu dan tempe goreng plus sambal. Warnan bebeknya kecokelatan mengilap dan menebarkan aroma gurih rempah dan manis kecap.


Foto: Wisma Putra

Daging bebek yang disajikan sangat empuk sehingga mudah digigit dan rasa rempahnya meresap. Yang terasa dominan aroma cabai dan bawang diselingi manis yang tak terlalu kuat. Makin mantap dicocol sambal segar yang beraroma cikur.Baca Juga : Mantul! Bebek Empuk Olahan Bu Sasangko yang Legendaris Manajemen Rumah Makan Saung Cobek Siti mengatakan, butuh proses panjang agar menghasilkan masakan Bebek yang enak dan legit di mulut."Bebeknya bisa digoreng atau dibakar, tapi kebanyakan dibakar. Dagingnya empuk karena melalui proses dulu, salah satunya di ungkep menggunakan panci presto," kata Siti kepada detikFood, Sabtu (2/11/2019).Selain itu, bebek yang disajikan di rumah makan ini kaya akan rempah-rempah pilihan yang diambil langsung dari sejumlah petani di Kabupaten Bandung.


Foto: Wisma Putra

"Yang bikin beda dikasih rempah-rempah, kuat dengan daun serai dan daun jeruk. Selain itu sambel yang disajikan mentah, dibuat dadakan di dalam cobek. Itu yang membuat segar, kan biasanya yang pulang liburan maunya yang pedas-pedas, sambel ini cocok sekali," ungkapnya.Bahan sambel cobek itu, di antaranya, cabai merah, cabai rawit ditambah bumbu jahe dan cikur (kencur muda). Ditambah tomat yang asam segar sehingga rasanya unik, beda dengan sambal lainnya.Rumah makan ini ada di Jalan Raya Baru Al-Fathu Soreang. Biasanya ramai dikunjungi di sore hingga malam hari, sepulang wisatawan dari arah Ciwidey yang hendak kembali ke Jakarta.Siti memuturkan, sejak didirikan empat tahun lalu. Setiap harinya, 5-10 ekor bebek terjual. Menu bebek banyak dipesan oleh pengunjung."Rata-rata sehari lima ekor, bebeknya kita beli dari pasar, ada khsus ynag jual bebek. Kalau sebulan bisa mencapai 150-300 ekor, tergantung ramai kunjungan aja," tuturnya.Harga satu porsi, Bebek Bakar Sambal Cobek ini Rp 35 ribu, lengkap dengan lauk lainnya tahu tempe, lalapan dan nasi putih."Antusiasme pengunjung cukup ramai, apalagi weekend. Selain menu itu, kami juga menyajikan menu lamanya di antaranya gurame cobek, ayam cobek hingga Soto Boyolali," pungkasnya.Baca Juga : Ini Ciri Khas Bebek Madura, yang Beda Dengan Bebek Surabaya Simak Video "Terjawab Sudah Cara Pelayan Bawa Piring di Rumah Makan Padang "[Gambas:Video 20detik](raf/odi)FOKUS BERITA Olahan Bebek Maknyus
text:
Processed Duck Maknyus
Really good! Legit Bebek Bakar Sambel Cobek Typical Soreang Dipocol Sambal Fresh
Nov 04 2019, 05:30 by Wisma Putra - detikFood


Photo: Wisma Putra

NEWS FOCUS Processed by Duck MaknyusBandung - Going home on vacation in Ciwidey Tourism Area? Confused looking for a place to eat that is comfortable and tasty food? Bebek Sambel Cobek can be an option. For fans of ducks, they must stop at RM Saung Cobek Soreang. Bebek Sambel Cobek is one of the most popular and best-selling menus at Saung Cobek Soreang Restaurant, Bandung Regency, West Java. Don't want to miss detikcom, and also took time to taste this culinary. One serving of Sambal Cobek Duck Duck consists of one piece of roasted duck, white rice, one tofu and fried tempeh plus sambal. The color of the duck is shiny brown and spreads a savory aroma of sweet and soy sauce.


Photo: Wisma Putra

The duck meat served is very tender so it is easy to bite and the flavor of the spices is pervasive. What feels dominant is the aroma of chili and onion interspersed with sweetness that is not too strong. The more solid dipped cikur fresh chili sauce. Also Read: Mantul! Processed Soft Duck Mrs. Sasangko the Legendary Saung Cobek Siti Restaurant Management said, it takes a long process to produce delicious and legit duck dishes in the mouth. ungkep uses a presto pan, "said Siti to detikFood, Saturday (11/02/2019). In addition, the duck served at this restaurant is rich in spices of choice taken directly from a number of farmers in Bandung Regency.


Photo: Wisma Putra

"What makes the difference is given the spices, strong with lemongrass leaves and orange leaves. In addition, the sambal that is served is raw, made impromptu in the mortar. That makes it fresh, usually those who come home on holiday want it to be spicy, this chili is perfect , "he said. The ingredients of the cobek sauce include red peppers, cayenne pepper plus ginger and cikur (young kencur) spices. Plus fresh sour tomatoes so that the taste is unique, different from other sambal. Usually crowded in the afternoon until the evening, after tourists from the direction of Ciwidey who want to return to Jakarta. Siti said, since it was founded four years ago. Every day, 5-10 ducks are sold. "Many duck menus are ordered by visitors." On average a day of five tails, we buy duck from the market, there is a special selling duck. If a month can reach 150-300 tails, depending on just a busy visit, "he said. The price of one portion, Duck Duck This Sambal Cobek is Rp. 35 thousand, complete with other side dishes of tofu, tempeh, lalapan and white rice. "The enthusiasm of visitors is quite crowded, especially on weekends. In addition to that menu, we also present a long menu including gurame cobek, chicken cobek to Soto Boyolali," he concluded Also Read: This Is a Characteristic of Madura Duck, Different from Surabaya Duck See Video "Answered Already How Waiters Bring Plates in Padang Restaurant" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (raf / odi) FOCUS NEWS Processed Duck Maknyus
